content:
/>
Introduction
This topic addresses exit interviews that MSCs must conduct with IDES participants, including
MSC responsibilities for exit interviews
interviews with IDES participants whose service department returned them to duty
who has responsibility for the initial processing of BDD claims
policies that are unique to BDD claims from former IDES participants
interviews with IDES participants that a PEB determined are unfit for duty
exit interviews by telephone
, and
updating VTA to reflect completion of an exit interview
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
